ygData.subject: Re: Re: AC Dilemma
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The priests in Permafrost sometimes cast see invisible on themselves and others.  If you re invisible and must pass within aggro range of a goblin, /con it
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 9 Nov 1999 hho@... wrote:
>
> Currently I am trying to get the Icy greavers, but my main
> problem is that no one on Bertox seems to hunt in Perma
> during my normal playing hours (evenings CET around
> 8-12PST), but getting to king room is not a problem if
> someone is keeping the area around the first gate clear.
> Anyone else notice that invisio seems to fail EVERY time
> you get near it (Atleast it did when I was 23 havent tried

The priests in Permafrost sometimes cast see invisible on
themselves and others. If you're invisible and must pass
within aggro range of a goblin, /con it first to make sure
it's indifferent.

That said, I've had several instances, all in Permafrost and
Lower Guk (live side), where stuff that I'd /conned as
indifferent just moments before attacked me. I'm pretty sure
my invisibility didn't drop, but they all ended up in trains
or fights so ugly the first attack scrolled off my buffer.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
